Mexico's Sheinbaum spurs hope of more private investment in energy after Lopez ObradorThe favorite to be Mexico's next leader will likely be more open than her mentor President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador to private investment in energy in order to help fund her renewable power push at a time of tighter public finances, aides, officials and executives said. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 12:09:50 GMT 3V5FR3DKUZNWLL3LBVUOIPAB5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexicos-sheinbaum-spurs-hope-more-private-investment-energy-after-lopez-obrador-2023-12-21/Dave Graham世界美洲
Sirens, interceptions in Tel Aviv as Hamas fires rockets from GazaSirens sounded in Tel Aviv and a Reuters camera crew witnessed rocket interceptions on Thursday as Hamas militants in the Gaza Strip said they launched a salvo at Israel's commercial capital. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 11:59:42 GMT O2D5225OWRNSJFKJ3FZNPCAYAU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/sirens-interceptions-tel-aviv-hamas-fires-rockets-gaza-2023-12-21/Reuters世界中东
Ukraine says it received last tranche of EU's 18 bln euro aid packageUkraine has received the last 1.5 billion euro ($1.65 billion)tranche from the 18 billion package from the European Union for 2023, Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal said on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 11:54:38 GMT GZ3HS76ITJMXHH54BMILNQAGKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-it-received-last-tranche-eus-18-bln-euro-aid-package-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲

Albanian opposition leader faces arrest after immunity liftedAlbania's parliament voted on Thursday to lift the immunity of opposition leader Sali Berisha after his indictment on corruption charges, a decision expected to lead to his arrest. Nigeria's $11 bln damages bill for collapsed gas deal thrown out by London courtAn $11 billion damages bill against Nigeria for a collapsed gas processing project which was procured by bribery has been thrown out by London's High Court. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 11:30:04 GMT R2WTINCG7JOMZPJRHBHCQ22TDI https://www.reuters.com/world/nigerias-11-bln-damages-bill-collapsed-gas-deal- thrown-out-by-london-court-2023-12-21/Reuters世界
Italian coalition parties vote against ESM reform in partl committeePrime Minister Giorgia Meloni's party and a key ally voted in a parliamentary commission on Thursday to oppose ratification of a long-waited reform of the euro zone bailout fund, lawmakers said. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 11:19:13 GMT GIN27DD42ZN7ZG6UXBSNMSSEUI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italian-coalition-parties-vote-against-esm-reform-partl-committee-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Under US pressure over fentanyl, Mexico wages “imaginary war on drugs”Mexico's army appears to be raiding only a handful of active drug labs every month, despite U.S. pressure to crack down on fentanyl trafficking, with facilities that were already out of use accounting for 95% of seizures this year, according to defense ministry figures obtained by Reuters. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 11:08:43 GMT VMNHPNP4WNKRFMYLCJZ2KDXI4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/under-us-Pressure-over-fentanyl-mexico-wages-imaginary-war-drugs-with-raids-2023-12-21/Drazen Jorgic, Jackie Botts世界美洲
Hungary's Orban says funds to Ukraine must not come from EU budgetHungary believes European Union funding to Ukraine must not be granted from the EU's budget and a "sensible" timeline should be set for any financing for Ukraine, Prime Minister Viktor Orban said on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 11:03:13 GMT 3E6TBXWDBFN5ZLEUD4JPD希凯https://www.reuters.com/world/hungarys-orban-says-funds-ukraine-must-not-come-eu-budget-2023-12-21/Gergely Szakacs, Krisztina Than世界

Iranian to appeal Swedish life sentence in executions caseA former Iranian official sentenced in Sweden to life in prison for his part in a mass execution of political prisoners in Iran will appeal against his conviction to the Supreme Court, his lawyer said on Thursday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 10:55:45 GMT YHLSET3TMJNZBHH3OQDXVDQMQI https://www.reuters.com/world/iranian-appeal-swedish-life-sentence-executions-case-2023-12-21/Reuters世界
